thread.title: The Amazing Nerdiverse – Episode 28: Thor Ragnarok, Batgirl & Star Wars Celebration Preview

author: Jeff Grantz
text:
Episode 28: Thor Ragnarok, Batgirl & Star Wars Celebration Preview The guys break down the first “Thor: Ragnarok” trailer, discuss Joss Whedon’s “Batgirl” movie and speculate on what we might be able to expect from Star Wars Celebration Orlando. Don’t forget to listen all the way to the end this week for an awesome giveaway! 


Please like the video for this episode and subscribe to our channel on YouTube for more podcasts, videos and movie reviews!
Also, please subscribe to The Amazing Nerdiverse podcast and leave a review (very important and super helpful) on iTunes !
Like/Follow our new Facebook Page and follow us on Twitter: @NerdiversePod @Jeff_Grantz @StevenTeuchert 
Thanks for listening!
